title: 08/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Doug Gottlieb steps in to give his thoughts on the quarterback battle in New England and why the Patriots are likely to go with former MVP Cam Newton as their play caller. He also outlines his concerns about the Dallas Cowboys as they prepare to contend for a Super Bowl title after last season’s disappointing finish. Plus, 4-time Super Bowl Champion Charlie Weis joins the show to tell Doug what Bill Belichick will do at QB as he continues to find a successor to Tom Brady.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
